name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SmartScout - Amazon Product & Brand Research, Profitability & History Chart

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find, evaluate, and save profitable products for Amazon FBA arbitrage & wholesale, all in one place. For free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to use and extremely powerful. The ultimate Amazon seller multi-tool built for Amazon Sellers, by Amazon Sellers. All the power of SmartScout in a compact ecommerce Chrome extension. Built with Online Arbitrage and Wholesale Amazon FBA sellers in mind.

Jump into profit calculation, history charts, brand opportunities and more with 1,000 free, full-feature, uses a month. No contract or credit card information needed.

All features include:

Product Opportunity Score - At-a-glance resell qualification insights with our custom Opportunity Score. Blaze through products and brands, and find the right opportunities, fast.

Simple & Advanced Profitability (FBA) Calculators - Whether you’re a speed user, or a power user, we’ve got your processes covered. We include everything from unit cost (cost of goods) to fully built out ROI. Get to the margin, fast.

Quick Access Product Details - One-click copy for all critical product information, including product titles, ASINs and UPCs (+ one click Google Search for UPCs). Complete workflows, fast.

Instant Eligibility Status & Resolution - Connect your Amazon Account with the SP-API and get one-click drill-down of all eligibility issues with one-click resolution links. Get qualified to sell, fast.

Listing Issues Drill Down - Instantly see if a listing has Amazon Presence, Private Label, HAZMAT, Oversize, or Variation issues. Get to the deal-breakers, fast.

Determine Demand and Competition - Using proprietary SmartScout data and sales estimates, quickly see what products are increasing in demand, and exactly what the competitive landscape looks like, fast.

Collect Your Favorite Products - Ditch the spreadsheets with SmartScout’s live data collections. Save your favorite products to collections and never hand-update Amazon fees again. Quick access allows you to return to your favorite products, fast.

History Charts Made Easy - Dive into historical Buy Box & Amazon Price, New Offer Count, Rating Count, Average Rating, Category & Subcategory BSR/Rank and more! Get to the critical data points, fast.

Cost Breakdown - Interested in the granular data on Amazon Fees? We’ve got you covered. Quickly access all the Amazon Fees for a product, fast.

Saved Presets & Customization - Configure the SmartScout Chrome Extension exactly the way you like it, whether it’s saved costs, or layout preferences, get to the right data, fast.


The SmartScout Chrome Extension relies on a connection via Amazon’s SP-API. For more information about our privacy policy visit smartscout.com/chrome-extension.

Online Arbitrage, Wholesale, and similar Amazon sellers, whether FBA or FBM, have been our focus through the development process.
